# **Black Friday/Cyber Weekend/Cyber Monday Sale 2020**

---

# **Site-wide Deals**

> ## 20% off site-wide (recurring)

> ***Promo code:*** *BF2020SW* ***Valid thru:*** *November 30th, 2020* <br />

# **VPS Deals**

> ## 50% off VPS (recurring)

> **- ([NVMe](https://www.spryservers.net/clients/cart.php?gid=32), [SSD](https://www.spryservers.net/clients/cart.php?gid=20)) - [Virtual Private Servers](https://www.spryservers.net/vps)**

> ***Promo code:*** BF2020VPS ***Valid thru:*** *November 30th, 2020*

> **SSD VPS Plans (Dallas, Phoenix)**
> * **[Flex SSD VPS](https://www.spryservers.net/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=206)\*** | 5GB SSD | 512MB RAM | 1vCPU | 1TB Transfer | $2.50/mo
> * **[SSD KVM Nano](https://www.spryservers.net/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=208)** | 10GB SSD | 512MB RAM | 1vCPU | 1TB Transfer | $3/mo | $30/yr
> * **[SSD KVM Micro](https://www.spryservers.net/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=209)**  | 20GB SSD | 1GB RAM | 1vCPU | 1TB Transfer | $5/mo | $50/yr

>**Included with all SSD plans:**
>* RAID-10 NVMe solid-state storage
>* Full hardware virtualization (KVM)
>* Dedicated IPv4 (Up to 8 IPs)
>* IPv6 /64 subnet
>* Instantly deployed

>* OS re-installs
>* Upgrade at any time
>* Daily automated disaster recovery backups

> **NVMe VPS Plans (Phoenix Only)**

> * **[NVMe KVM Micro](https://www.spryservers.net/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=293)**  | 16GB NVMe | 1GB RAM | 1vCPU | 1TB Transfer @ 1Gbps | $5/mo | $50/yr

>  **Terms and Conditions** Offers valid through November 30th, 2020. Offers void if similar package is cancelled within 45 days.
